chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
v: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
0 < vec_sum v -> {p : pos n & {w : Vector.t nat n | v = vec_plus (vec_one p) w}}

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
vec_one = fun (n : nat) (p : pos n) => vec_set_pos (fun q : pos n => if pos_eq_dec p q then 1 else 0) : forall n : nat, pos n -> vec nat n Arguments vec_one {n}%nat_scope
vec_sum : forall n : nat, vec nat n -> nat
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
vec_plus = fun (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n) => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => (v#>p) + (w#>p)) : forall n : nat, vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n Arguments vec_plus {n}%nat_scope
vec_change_succ : forall (n : nat) (v : vec nat n) (p : pos n), v[(S (v#>p))/p] = vec_plus (vec_one p) v
vec_change_pred : forall (n : nat) (v : vec nat n) (p : pos n) (u : nat), v#>p = S u -> v = vec_plus (vec_one p) (v[u/p])
vec_sum_is_zero : forall (n : nat) (v : vec nat n), vec_sum v = 0 -> v = vec_zero
vec_sum_one : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), vec_sum (vec_one p) = 1
vec_sum_plus : forall (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n), vec_sum (vec_plus v w) = vec_sum v + vec_sum w
pow2_2n1_dec : forall n : nat, {p : nat & {b : nat | S n = pow2 p * (2 * b + 1)}}
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p = q where ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
vec_plus_comm : forall (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n), vec_plus v w = vec_plus w v
vec_plus_is_zero : forall (n : nat) (u v : vec nat n), vec_zero = vec_plus u v -> u = vec_zero /\ v = vec_zero
vec_zero_plus : forall (n : nat) (v : vec nat n), vec_plus vec_zero v = v
vec_plus_assoc : forall (n : nat) (u v w : vec nat n), vec_plus u (vec_plus v w) = vec_plus (vec_plus u v) w
VectorSpec.take_O : forall (le : 0 <= ?n) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.take 0 le v0 = vec_nil where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.nth_order : vec ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
ssrfun.Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x0 : ?I & T_ x0} where ?I : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?i : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- ?I]
vec_pos_plus : forall (n : nat) (v w : vec nat n) (p : pos n), vec_plus v w#>p = (v#>p) + (w#>p)
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : pos m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (pos n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, pos m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
vec_plus_cons : forall (n x : nat) (v : vec nat n) (y : nat) (w : vec nat n), vec_plus (x ## v) (y ## w) = x + y ## vec_plus v w
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.of_nat_lt = fix of_nat_lt (p n : nat) {struct p} : p < n -> pos n := match n as n0 return (p < n0 -> pos n0) with | 0 => fun H : p < 0 => False_rect (pos 0) (Nat.nlt_0_r p H) | S n' => match p as p0 return (p0 < S n' -> pos (S n')) with | 0 => fun _ : 0 < S n' => pos0 | S p' => fun H : S p' < S n' => pos_nxt (of_nat_lt p' n' (lt_S_n p' n' H)) end end : forall p n : nat, p < n -> pos n Arguments Fin.of_nat_lt {p n}%nat_scope
pos_nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> {i : nat | i < n}
nat_pos : forall n : nat, {i : nat | i < n} -> pos n
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
ssrfun.svalP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x}, ?P (proj1_sig u) where ?T : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?P : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- ?T -> Prop]
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat v : vec nat n |- Type]
FinFun.bFun = fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => forall x : nat, x < n -> f x < n : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.bFun _%nat_scope _%function_scope
pos_map = fun m n : nat => pos m -> pos n : nat -> nat -> Set Arguments pos_map (_ _)%nat_scope
